humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the maximum dimension of the invasive component of the tumor as 2.2 cm. According to the rules provided, T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is based on the size of the tumor. In this report, the size of the tumor is described as 'Maximum dimension invasive component: 2.2 cm'. According to the TNM staging system, a T2 stage is given to tumors that are greater than 2 cm in size but not greater than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
